reviews.review_msg: Great teacher, very genuine and kind. Very knowledgeable on math, and is willing to take the time to teach math concepts in different styles. It would be nice if she returned assignments quicker.

Harpreet is currently teaching in BCIT. I would say overall her teaching is great. She always be prepared, and she teaches useful skills to solve problems. She never refuses to answer questions, and she gives practice tests and solutions prior the real ones take place. By the way, she is a charming instructor.
I like her way of approaching different problems.  She makes math so much easier.
She is a great instructor. She is really good at mathematics. She made math much easier for me. I would certainly take her class for any future math courses.

Unfortunately, Harpreet's teaching skills were lacking as she is a brand new instructor. Often glances quickly over math steps and leaves it up to students to figure out how she got from A to Z. Harpreet also was not at her scheduled office hours on 3 separate occasions. This class however was an easy A, but I mostly taught myself the material.
